name: The Headless Horseman
description:
The world has fallen into an Unstable state! Massive cursed pumpkins crash into the Earth bring death and disorder. The Headless Horseman is on the hunt for his head and must reach it before the Grim Reaper catches him.

- Jump past the Cursed Pumpkins.

- Avoid the Grim Reaper.

- Reach your real head at the end!

Controls:

- Spacebar / Primary Button on Gamepad ("A" for xbox controller).
